channel.title: Help Please! (:
channel.description:
Hey guys! I'm fairly new to programming Runescape Private Servers.
I have a quick question, how do you make an NPC give you an item. I'm using 317. I've setup this basic dialogue: [code] case 158: talk("Lucky you "+playerName+", death isn't awaiting you. Want this head? I got it off my last victim.", 2862); break; case 159: choice ("Sure.", "Ew Disgusting!") break;[/code] I want NPC ID 2862 (Grim Reaper) to give the player Item ID 6722 (Zombie Head) if you choose "Sure." How do I implement it?
Thanks!

item.title: Help Please! (:
item.dc:creator: @Spencer4678 Spencer4678
item.description:
@Spencer4678 wrote:

Hey guys! I’m fairly new to programming Runescape Private Servers.

I have a quick question, how do you make an NPC give you an item. I’m using 317.
I’ve setup this basic dialogue:

case 158: talk("Lucky you "+playerName+", death isn't awaiting you. Want this head? I got it off my last victim.", 2862); break; case 159: choice ("Sure.", "Ew Disgusting!") break;
I want NPC ID 2862 (Grim Reaper) to give the player Item ID 6722 (Zombie Head) if you choose “Sure.”
How do I implement it?

Thanks!

Read full topic
